Transit Widget Emulator 1.2.2 build 20101210

December 10, 2010

This is a defect release fixing some API issues for WAC 1.0 and JIL 1.2.2 specs. No new features or profile database changes have been made.

Fixes

  • Issue 6: "WAC 1.0 Message.addAddress call" http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=6&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
  • Issue 7: "Widget.Device.getAvailableApplications() doesn't return an array." http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=7&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
  • Issue 9: "setPreferenceForKey throws an exception when parameter is valid" http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=9&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
  • Issue 10: "Widget.Multimedia.AudioPlayer.open() doesn't throw an exception" http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=10&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
  • Issue 11: " Widget.Multimedia.AudioPlayer.play() doesn't throw an exception" http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=11&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
  • Issue 12: "Widget.PIM.getAddressBookItem() doesn't throw an INVALID_PARAMETER exception" http://code.google.com/p/transit-widget-tools/issues/detail?id=12&can=1&q=label%3AFix_1.2.2.20101210
